name: SPLIT_NAME
description: A name of a subset we want to use. This name is used to index the dataset object created from load_dataset to retrieve a specific subset of its data

name: INPUT_FEATURE_NAME
description: A name of a feature/attribute we want to use as an input to the model. This name is used to index the subset of data to retrieve a specific feature obtained from each datapoint in the subset

name: LABEL_FEATURE_NAME
description: A name of a feature/attribute we want to use as an ground truth label to compare predictions to. This name is used to index the subset of data to retrieve a specific feature obtained from each datapoint in the subset

name: NUM_DATAPOINTS_TO_CLASSIFY
description: Number of datapoints we want to apply the classification task to. If not specified, we classify the entire subset of data

name: BATCH_SIZE
description: Size of a batch that is used to compute classification in parallel. Default value: 8
